originalText.text: I've been going to M.B. Fashions Valet for many years and they never disappoint. Recently, I dropped off a jacket of mine and the pockets were in shambles. Elfy did a beautiful job repairing my jacket. Joey the owner is so professional, friendly and reasonable with his rates. I highly recommend them if you are in need of any of their services (dry cleaning, laundry, alterations, etc). They do an excellent job across the board!

text.text: I've been going to M.B. Fashions Valet for many years and they never disappoint. Recently, I dropped off a jacket of mine and the pockets were in shambles. Elfy did a beautiful job repairing my jacket. Joey the owner is so professional, friendly and reasonable with his rates. I highly recommend them if you are in need of any of their services (dry cleaning, laundry, alterations, etc). They do an excellent job across the board!

originalText.text: I am a loyal customer of this place. Always friendly, on time and most importantly - a good price on alterations and dry cleaning. I recommend them to all my friends in the area and they have been happy with their service as well.

text.text: I am a loyal customer of this place. Always friendly, on time and most importantly - a good price on alterations and dry cleaning. I recommend them to all my friends in the area and they have been happy with their service as well.

originalText.text: Clean, professional, and responsible wash and fold service. I call them at 8:50am and they pick up my massive bag of laundry at 9am. It’s back nice and folded with my doorman by 5pm. They put the clothes in plastic to preserve the fold and keep them from getting dirty. I’ve had no issues!

text.text: Clean, professional, and responsible wash and fold service. I call them at 8:50am and they pick up my massive bag of laundry at 9am. It’s back nice and folded with my doorman by 5pm. They put the clothes in plastic to preserve the fold and keep them from getting dirty. I’ve had no issues!

originalText.text:
I recently dropped off a load of dry cleaning at MB Fashion Valet . My wife is an executive in NYC and requires a professional look every day . The cleaners lost articles of her clothing . They said they would try to search for the missing article but after a week passed nothing turned up . The owner called and then denied ever having lost any clothing . After my wife complained he said he did not need our business .

I now take our cleaning to a new cleaners a few hundred yards away on the same block !

originalText.text: I really like going here. They are professional and very friendly. Prices are fare. I have recommended this place to few of my friends and they are still my friends.
